metadata.title: StreamYard vs Restream 2025: Which Multistreaming Platform Wins?
metadata.description: Compare StreamYard and Restream for live streaming. Features, pricing, and which platform is best for YouTube creators.

hero.headline: StreamYard vs Restream: Complete Comparison
hero.subheadline: Two browser-based multistreaming platforms. Which one fits your YouTube live streaming needs?

sections.content: Both StreamYard and Restream let you broadcast to multiple platforms simultaneously from your browser. No downloads, no complex OBS setup. But they approach live streaming differently. StreamYard focuses on production features and guest management. Restream emphasizes multistreaming reach and scheduling. Here's how they compare for YouTube creators.

content.title: Guest Experience
content.description: Best-in-class guest experience. Simple links, easy controls, professional look.

content.title: Built-in Production
content.description: Overlays, banners, and layouts included. No design skills needed.

content.title: On-Screen Comments
content.description: Display viewer comments on stream with one click. Great for engagement.

content.title: Multistream Power
content.description: 30+ destinations in one stream. Reach every platform simultaneously.

content.title: Advanced Scheduling
content.description: Schedule streams, manage events, and organize your streaming calendar.

content.title: Cross-Platform Analytics
content.description: See performance across all platforms in unified analytics dashboard.

sections.title: Choose StreamYard If
content: You frequently have guests on your streams
You want built-in graphics without design work

faq.question: Which is better for YouTube specifically?
faq.answer: Both work great with YouTube. StreamYard edges out for guest shows. Restream wins for simulcasting to YouTube plus many other platforms.

faq.question: Can I use OBS with these platforms?
faq.answer: Both support RTMP, so yes. But if you're using OBS anyway, you might not need eitherâ€”OBS can multistream directly with plugins.

faq.question: Do they affect stream quality?
faq.answer: Both re-encode your stream, which can slightly reduce quality. For most YouTube content, it's not noticeable. Direct encoding is slightly better.

faq.question: Which has better free tier?
faq.answer: Depends on needs. StreamYard free includes watermark but full features. Restream free has multistreaming but limited features. Try both.
